messages.en: Liskarm! Can the defenses still hold on?

messages.zh: 芙兰卡，注意敌人侧翼进攻！
messages.en: Franka, beware of the enemies’ flanks!
Medic team! We have wounded here!
Where do you want to hide?

messages.zh: 你们逃不掉的。我会粉碎你们——彻彻底底的粉碎你们。
messages.en: You can’t escape. I will crush you——completely crush you.

messages.zh: 哦~这家伙终于亲自登场了。
messages.en: Oh~This guy finally shows up himself.

messages.zh: 我们被整合运动逼入死路了。
messages.en: We’re forced into a dead end by Reunion Movement.

messages.zh: 啧——只能硬上了。重装小组，守住阵地！
messages.en: Psst——We can only bear through this now. Shield team, hold your grounds!

messages.zh: 身为感染者，却帮助龙门杀害感染者——
messages.en: Being the Infected, yet helping Lungmen slaughter other Infected——

messages.zh: 多少同胞的性命，你们——得血债血偿！
messages.en: So many of our kinds’ lives, you——have to pay with blood!

messages.zh: 先结仇的、先伤害别人的、先使用暴力的——
messages.en: Those who caused hatred first, harmed others first, and used violence first——

messages.zh: 可是切尔诺伯格的你们！！
